package.name: Olark_Chatbox
package.summary: Drive more sales. Talk to your customers on your Magento store with Olark Live Chat.
package.description:
Talk to your customers. You'll sell more, faster.
Olark Live Chat helps thousands of businesses talk to the customers browsing their website so they can drive more sales.
With Olark's CartSaver extension for Magento, you can put an end to abandoned shopping carts. Watch your customers add and remove items from their shopping carts while they shop and then step in to talk to them to close the sale.
Try it FREE at Olark.com.
package.notes: This is the first stable release of the official Olark Live Chat CartSaver extension for Magento. It should work for all versions from Magento 1.5 upwards.
